_sText: So yeah , Christmas is getting closer and closer , so i decided to make X-mas styled Fightyard map! very basic but fun (IMO) contains custom present models from mrkit4423 (already included , like sound background) READ THIS: I'Ve incliuded audio background for the map , however it won't start itself automatically every round (i think that listening 3213243x times few seconds of the audio clip would be annoying) , but if you want to listen to it put in your console : play eve.mp3 (you have to put that every round , so a good solution is to bind it bind (key you want) "play eve.mp3"
